title: Rape rate highest in India as women don’t wear hijab: Karnataka Congress leader - Times of India
content:
1. Rape rate highest in India as women don’t wear hijab: Karnataka Congress leader  Times of India
  2. ‘Highest number of rapes in India because…’: Karnataka Congress leader on hijab row  Hindustan Times
  3. "Rapes Because Women Don't Wear Hijab": Karnataka Congress MLA's Shocker  NDTV
  4. Hijab Row: Congress Leader Stirs Controversy, Claims 'Women Get Raped When They Don't Wear Hijab'  Republic World
  5. Daily brief: Congress leader says India has high number of rape cases as women don't wear hijab, and all the latest news  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Karnataka state Congress leader Zameer Ahmed slammed Kerala Governor Arif Mohammad Khan for his 'hijab is not essential to Islam' comment and said that India records a high number of rape cases because women don't wear hijab. Zameer Ahmed said, "Hijab protects the beauty of a girl. Today in India, I believe, the rape rates are highest. What's the reason? Because women are not under gosh-e-parda (Hijab)."
